---
title: "Using quantiles with dplyr"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
mtcars %>% 
  mutate(
    quantile_95 = quantile(mpg, 0.95),
    qntl = if_else(mpg < quantile_95, "95%", "5%")
  ) %>%
  group_by(qntl) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(mpg), n = n())
```
